LanguageData.DIL_ComfortReceived.label: comforted
LanguageData.DIL_ComfortReceived.stages.0.label: comforted
LanguageData.DIL_ComfortReceived.stages.0.description: I was comforted by someone when I was feeling down.
LanguageData.DIL_SuccessfulMediation.label: mediation successful
LanguageData.DIL_SuccessfulMediation.stages.0.label: mediation successful (minor)
LanguageData.DIL_SuccessfulMediation.stages.0.descrip: I'm relieved that the argument was resolved peacefully, even if it didn't make a huge difference.
LanguageData.DIL_SuccessfulMediation.stages.1.label: mediation successful (moderate)
LanguageData.DIL_SuccessfulMediation.stages.1.descrip: That mediation really helped cool things down. It feels good to get along better now.
LanguageData.DIL_SuccessfulMediation.stages.2.label: mediation successful (major)
LanguageData.DIL_SuccessfulMediation.stages.2.descrip: That was an amazing mediation! It's like a weight has been lifted and we can all get along again.
LanguageData.DIL_InMediationWith.label: mediated conflict
LanguageData.DIL_InMediationWith.stages.0.label: mediated conflict
LanguageData.DIL_InMediationWith.label: in mediation with {0}
LanguageData.DIL_InMediationWith.description: I'm glad we had a chance to talk things out in mediation with {0}. I feel like we understand each other better now.
LanguageData.DIL_ReceivedGift.label: received a gift
LanguageData.DIL_ReceivedGift.description: Someone gave me a gift and while it was a small thing, I was moved by the gesture.
LanguageData.DIL_ReceivedCompliment.label: received compliment
LanguageData.DIL_ReceivedCompliment.description: I received a compliment recently. It feels good to be appreciated!
LanguageData.DIL_ReceivedTeaching.label: received teaching
LanguageData.DIL_IdeologicalDiscussion.label: ideological discussion
LanguageData.DIL_SharedPassionActivity.label: shared passion
LanguageData.DIL_SharedPassionActivity.description: I recently spent some time enjoying my passion with someone who appreciates it as much as I do.
LanguageData.DIL_Thought_StorytellingAttendee.label: heard a story
LanguageData.DIL_Thought_StorytellingAttendee.descrip: It was nice to hear a story. I feel a little closer to the storyteller.
LanguageData.DIL_Thought_StorytellingOrganizer.label: told a story
LanguageData.DIL_Thought_StorytellingOrganizer.descri: Sharing my story was a nice moment. I hope others enjoyed it too.
